import {useState} from 'react' import { Button, Toast } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './FunFacts.css' function FunFact(){ const [show, setShow] = useState(true); const toggleShow = () => setShow(!show); return (
I have a cat
her name is Xiatian(summer) 16 months ago I met her beside a trash bin ...
) } export default FunFact
